thread.section_title: Business Wire Technology: Consumer Electronics News
thread.title: CES 2016 Press Day Schedule

title: CES 2016 Press Day Schedule
text:
CES 2016 Press Day Schedule Mandalay Bay hosts series of preshow press events January 4-5 October 21, 2015 10:00 AM   
--( BUSINESS WIRE )--The Consumer Electronics Association (CEA) ® today announced the CES ® 2016 schedule for its official Press Day . Open exclusively to CES registered media, Press Day features exhibitor press conferences from 8 AM-5 PM Tuesday, January 5, 2016 at Mandalay Bay. 
Registered CES media are encouraged to save the date for the following Press Day events: 
ADDITIONAL PRESS DAY EVENTS Press Day also will feature a full line-up of exhibitor Power Sessions, 30-minute press conferences for companies looking to share their news quickly. Beginning at 8:30 AM, Power Sessions will take place at Mandalay Bay, South Convention Center, level 3, Palm Ballroom A. A full schedule of Power Sessions will be posted to the Official Press Events section of CESweb.org. 
LOGISTICS A complimentary shuttle bus service will run from select official CES hotels to Mandalay Bay between 6:30 AM and 7 PM on Press Day. A full transportation schedule will be available online . Lunch will be available to registered CES media beginning at 11:30 AM on Press Day in the Mandalay Bay Press Room (South Convention Center, level 2, Breakers Ballroom), sponsored by AutoTrader.com and Kelley Blue Book. All CES 2016 press room locations and hours are available online . 
OTHER PRESHOW PRESS EVENTS On Monday, January 4, 2016, CES media are also encouraged to attend the following press events at Mandalay Bay, North Convention Center, level 1: CES Unveiled Las Vegas 4-7:30 PM, South Pacific Ballroom 
CES 2016 exhibit halls will open 10 AM Wednesday, January 6, 2016. Visit CESweb.org for more information on CES. 
Note to Editors: The official name of the global technology event is “CES ® .” Please do not use “Consumer Electronics Show” or “International CES” to refer to the event. 
About CES: 
CES is the world’s gathering place for all who thrive on the business of consumer technologies. It has served as the proving ground for innovators and breakthrough technologies for more than 40 years—the global stage where next-generation innovations are introduced to the marketplace. As the largest hands-on event of its kind, CES features all aspects of the industry. And because it is owned and produced by the Consumer Electronics Association (CEA), the technology trade association representing the $285 billion U.S. consumer electronics industry, it attracts the world’s business leaders and pioneering thinkers to a forum where the industry’s most relevant issues are addressed. Check out CES video highlights . Follow CES online at www.CESweb.org and on social . 
UPCOMING EVENTS
